Commercial Terms and Conditions:


Terms of Payment:

      50% of the Order Value shall be paid as an interest free advance along with the PO.

    50% of the Order Value shall be paid against Proforma Invoice with 100% Taxes & duties, before despatch of the material.

Freight & Insurance:

     Freight & Insurance and other charges shall be extra at your account.

Packing:

     Packing Charges are not included in our offer.

Delivery Terms:

      EXW, Chennai

Delivery Time:

      Normal delivery time is 6 to 8 Weeks from the effective date of drawing approval.

      Effective date of Purchase order is the date on which all the below conditions are satisfied.

  1. Receipt of a firm and clear Purchase Order from the Customer.
  2. Receipt of the advance payment as mentioned in Payment terms.
  3. Receipt of drawing approval (Final) from the respective authority to start manufacturing. However we shall try to improve our delivery time, which shall be confirmed at the time of Order Confirmation.
Free of Issue Materials:

      Free Issue Material is not applicable.

      Storage Charges are not applicable.

name: Terms & Conditions

html:
General Terms and Conditions:


Drawings:

We shall submit preliminary drawings for your approval within 7 working Days from the date of receipt of all the necessary inputs/documents/drawings related to the work/project after the acceptance of your firm & detailed Purchase Order from you. In case any delay in receiving such inputs from your side, there will be delay in drawing submission accordingly. We shall provide two final sets of drawings along with despatch documents for your reference and records.

Inspection Call:

Where inspections and tests are performed they will be undertaken in accordance with the Voltech's standard practice, including test documentation, and will be carried out at the place of manufacture or elsewhere at the Voltech's sole discretion. Such inspections and tests, together with any additional tests as may be specified in our quotation, are the only inspections and tests included in the quoted price. Should any further inspection or tests be required by the Purchaser, these will be subject to the Voltech's agreement and may result in an increase in the contract price agreed between both the parties and an extension to the time for delivery.

Where the carrying out of an inspection or witnessed test has been agreed to, M/s Voltech shall give the Purchaser Ten days' notice that Voltech is ready to carry out such inspection or witnessed test, and if the Purchaser is absent from a duly notified inspection or witnessed test then such inspection or witnessed test shall be deemed to have been undertaken in the Purchaser's presence such that the outcome of the inspection or test will be deemed to be accepted by the Purchaser.

We will send you the Routine test report for you to give the despatch clearance. All charges towards this factory inspection shall be borne by the customer.

Confidentiality:

With reference to these Terms and Conditions, the following information is deemed as “Confidential Information”: the content of the present Terms and Conditions, any information that is technical, commercial, strategic, financial, economic, related to research, technical specifications, Product, development and marketing plans and/or proposals, training methods and materials, inventions, processes, studies, records, reports, memoranda, drafts, trade secrets, know-how, ideas, concepts, strategies, and any and all other information which is confidential by its nature, no matter on which medium and in which form (verbal, visual or written) it is communicated by M/s Voltech to Purchaser. Purchaser shall not disclose any such Confidential Information to any third party and shall not use any such Confidential Information for any purpose other than as agreed by the parties and in conformance with the Contract.

Force Majeure:

In no event will M/s Voltech be liable for any delay or non-delivery or any other failure to perform an obligation due to any event of Force Majeure. Force Majeure means every external, unpredictable, and irresistible event.

In case of such a failure due to Force Majeure, the performance of the relevant part(s) of the Commercial Transaction will be suspended for the period such non-attributable failure continues, without M/s Voltech being responsible or liable to Purchaser for any damage resulting therefrom.

Consequential Damages:

M/s VMCL shall in no event be responsible for or liable to the Purchaser or his agencies/subcontractors for consequential damages suffered by the Purchaser or his agencies/subcontractors including without limitation, business interruption or loss of profits, whether such liability is based or claimed to be based upon;

  1. i) Any breach by M/s VMCL of its obligations under the contract;
  2. ii) Any negligent act or omission on the part of by M/s VMCL or any of its employees, agents or appointed representatives in connection with the performance of the works.
Liquidated Damages:

Liquidated Damages not applicable.

Termination/Cancellation Clause:

In case of Termination/Order cancellation by either parties (M/s Voltech & Purchaser), the same shall be intimated 30 Days prior in writing and all the expenses resulting for Voltech or engaged in negotiation of the sale and in production by M/s Voltech will be invoiced to buyer.

Disputes and applicable law:

All disputes arising out of a contract and relating to goods or services supplied by M/s Voltech, to which these terms apply in whole or in part, or arising out of additional contracts, shall be adjudicated by the District Court in Chennai.

The law of India shall apply exclusively to all contracts or additional contracts to which these terms apply in whole or in part.

Intellectual Property:

All patents, trademarks, copyrights and any other intellectual property in the Goods remain the sole property of M/s Voltech at all times and the Purchaser agrees that it will not infringe any of Voltech's intellectual property rights.

All drawings and technical specifications supplied or made available to the Purchaser by M/s Voltech are subject to copyright and strictly confidential. The Purchaser must not:

  1. communicate any details of any drawings or technical specifications to any third party without VMCL's prior consent in writing; or
  2. make any copies of or use the drawings or technical specifications for any purpose other than expressly authorised in writing.
Warranty:

The warranty period expires, with respect to the Product Supply, on the earlier of

  1. the date which is eighteen (18) months from the date of despatch of the Product, or
  2. twelve (12) months from the date the of commissioning of supplied Product, whichever period expires first.

This warranty extends only to the original Purchaser and will not apply to any Products which have been repaired or altered other than by Voltech, Purchaser’s failure to meet environmental specifications, or products which have been subjected to misuse, improper installation, negligence, accident, unusual physical or electrical stress, modification, storage, transportation or improper handling or other causes other than the normal and intended use of the products. Purchaser is responsible for any charges uponexpiration of the applicable warranty period.

We trust our offer is found competitive and look forward to the pleasure of receiving your valued order which will receive our prompt attention.

We look forward to your communication.

Note: In the event of Order, kindly mention our factory address given below:


M/s Voltech Manufacturing Company Limited
(Switchgear Division)
2/431-B, Sri Kumaran Nagar,
Kundrathur Main Road, Kovur
Chennai - 600122.
Tamilnadu, India.
Ph: +91-44-29301092
Email: panel@voltechgroup.com



Yours truly,
For Voltech Manufacturing Company Ltd.,




R. Rajayogesh
Vice President - Marketing
+(91) 9791144003s
